```{r}
library(polySimIBD)
```

```{r, results='asis', fig.align='center', fig.width=8, fig.height=6, fig.retina=2}


k <- 5
rho = 1e-5
chrompos <- data.frame(CHROM = factor("chrom1"),
                       POS = sort(floor(runif(n = 1e2, 1, 5e5))) )


sim <- polySimIBD::simulate_IBD_pop_Pedigree(chrompos = chrompos, 
                                             rho = rho, 
                                             k = k
                                           #  ,inbreeding = 0.5
                                             )
  

plot_between_lineages_simulatedpedigree(sim)
plot_within_lineage_simulatedpedigree(sim, lineage = 1)


```
